name: Game of Life for Notion
description: Introducing the Game of Life Notion Template: Transform Your Goals into Daily AchievementsAs time marches on, it's surprising how quickly the days and months pass us by. We often find ourselves reflecting on how much time has elapsed and questioning the progress of our personal goals. Are you on track with your objectives, or do you find yourself grappling with the resolutions you set out with optimism? You're certainly not alone in this journey. This is a common challenge many of us face, repea
features: Skipping the snooze button? Earn 1 point.; Writing in my morning journal? Bag 3 points.; Hitting the gym? Score a whopping 9 points.
